description: We're now unconditionally injecting network configuration. If no nics are set to be injected, we're just left with an interfaces files that only gets a loopback device up and running. This needs to stop.
title: Unconditionally injects network configuration

comments.content: We're now unconditionally injecting network configuration. If no nics are set to be injected, we're just left with an interfaces files that only gets a loopback device up and running. This needs to stop.
